duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle accounting responsibilities for a property management company with separate QuickBooks files for numerous operating entities.
Provide administrative support to all locations, including all accounting and payroll functions, ensuring policy and procedure are followed and updated regularly.

Manage all accounting operations including Accounts Receivable, Accounts Payable, Historical Cost Accounting, Job Costing, Inventory, Payroll reporting, filing of quarterly 941 & UCT-6a, annual preparation of W-2 & 1099's, General Ledger entries, etc.
Conduct month-end closings, account reconciliations, and balance sheet/profit and loss statements reporting to senior management.
Maintain the highest level of confidentiality and ethical standards, and develop cooperative working relationships with company and business contacts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or a related field (Master's preferred). Property Management experience is a plus.
